/pbcoreInstantiation/instantiationMediaType[. != "Moving Image" and . != "Sound" and . != "other"]
	dirty-yes-fix-bad-relation-and-language.xml
/pbcoreInstantiation[not(instantiationMediaType)]
	dirty-yes-fix-bad-relation-and-language.xml
swapped pbcoreRelation children
	dirty-yes-fix-bad-relation-and-language.xml
